thread.section_title: My Tool Store Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of My Tool Store Australia | www.mytoolstore.com.au
thread.title: Michael Lewis
thread.title_full: My Tool Store Australia reviewed by Michael Lewis

author: Michael Lewis
title: Michael Lewis
text: Rob stands behind the products he sells, with a level of support and service - before and after the sale - that larger operations often promise but rarely (if ever) deliver. (I'm aware that some other on-line retailers source some of their products from MTS. Presumably they have the same level of confidence that I have.)
